Docs.summary: The namespace contains classes to generate Entity Data Model (EDM) files and object source code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design> classes support the EDM tools. For more information about the EDM tools, see <https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb399249(v=vs.100)>.
